home.statisticsText: We regularly demonstrate growth and development through numbers. Our goal is to provide you with the most convenient and effective solutions.
home.allInOne: All government services in one application
home.allInOneDesc: Online government services in your pocket! With our mobile application you can easily use electronic services, track and pay коммунal payments, fines, tax obligations, and receive electronic notifications in life situations
